-------------------------------

Hello family,

back with the freshest news.


If you have been following us you'll know that we recently recorded 3 greatest hits, as cool as possible to be able to withstand the summer. Well, they are already here!

This was the maxi single 2.0 beta 1, which includes a sample of the new tracks we are cooking, with beats ranging from eurodance from early 90's to the latest techno, through styles like dubstep or reggaeton, a bliss!

If you want to get it physically the only way you have is going to the kiosk and buy the June issue of Enderrock, where you'll find a CD with the 3 new songs from Orxata, 3 tracks on the Compartir DÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³na Gustet new album and 3 unreleased tracks from the experimental group E.S.O.C.

If you can not wait or you don't know what to do with physical formats, the fastest way to get the 3  new tracks is going to Jamendo and downloading them totally free!

We have done the maxi single to share it, so we hope you enjoy it and you share it as much as you can, embed it on your blogs, put it in eMule, burn CD's and give them, play it in your parties, ... Kids summer is coming!
